response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds immense value for us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. We understand its worth to you might be $1,000,000, but we hope you'll consider the unique opportunity this presents. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
